CustomField.formula: if(LEN(Office_Street__c)>0, Office_Street__c& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(Office_City__c)>0, Office_City__c& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(Office_State__c)>0, Office_State__c& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Office_Postal_Code__c)>0, Office_Postal_Code__c,"") & BR() & If(LEN(Text(Office_Country__c)) >0, Text(Office_Country__c),"")
CustomField.label: Office Address
